TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DbCommandBuilder extends System.ComponentModel.Component
Public MustInherit Class DbCommandBuilder Inherits Component
public ref class DbCommandBuilder abstract : System::ComponentModel::Component

summary.span: 自动生成用于协调 的更改与关联数据库的单表命令。

span.span: Automatically generates single-table commands used to reconcile changes made to a with the associated database.

summary.span: 这是一个只能被继承的抽象类。

span.span: This is an abstract class that can only be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供类是为了方便提供程序编写器创建自己的命令生成器。The class is provided for the convenience of provider writers creating their own command builders. 通过继承此类，开发人员可以在自己的代码中实现特定于提供程序的行为。By inheriting from this class, developers can implement provider specific behavior in their own code. 不 会自动生成将对的更改 与关联的数据源进行协调所需的 SQL 语句。The does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a with the associated data source. 但是，如果设置了的属性，则可以创建一个 对象来自动为单表更新生成 SQL 语句 。However, you can create a object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the property of the . 然后，将生成未设置的任何其他 SQL 语句 。Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the . 只要设置属性，就会将自身注册为事件侦听器 。The registers itself as a listener for events whenever you set the property. 一次只能将一个 或 对象彼此关联。You can only associate one or object with each other at one time. 若要生成 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句，请 使用 属性来自动检索所需的元数据集。To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the uses the property to retrieve a required set of metadata automatically. 如果在 检索元数据后更改， (例如，在第一次更新) 后，应调用 方法来更新元数据。If you change the after the metadata has been retrieved (for example, after the first update), you should call the method to update the metadata. `SelectCommand` 还必须至少返回一个主键或唯一列。The `SelectCommand` must also return at least one primary key or unique column. 如果不存在， 则会生成异常，并且不生成命令。If none exist, an exception is generated, and the commands are not generated. 还使用引用的 、 和 属性 。The also uses the , , and properties referenced by the . 如果修改了这些属性中的任何一个，则用户应调用，或者是否 替换本身。The user should call if any of these properties are modified, or if the itself is replaced. 否则 ，、 和 属性将保留其以前的值。Otherwise the , , and properties retain their previous values. 如果调用 ，将 从解除关联 ，并且不再使用生成的命令。If you call , the is disassociated from the , and the generated commands are no longer used.

related.span: 使用 CommandBuilder 生成命令

param.name: parameter
param.span: 要将附加修改应用到的 。

span.span: A to which the additional modifications are applied.

param.name: row
param.span: 来自由 提供的架构表的 。

span.span: The from the schema table provided by .

param.name: statementType
param.span: 生成的命令的类型；INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE。

span.span: The type of command being generated; INSERT, UPDATE or DELETE.

param.name: whereClause
param.span: 如果参数是 update 或 delete WHERE 子句的一部分，则为 ；如果是 insert 或 update 值的一部分，则为 。

span.span: if the parameter is part of the update or delete WHERE clause, if it is part of the insert or update values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法允许类的实现 来处理特定于提供程序的参数属性。This method allows an implementation of the class to handle provider-specific parameter properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 方法和 `Finalize` 方法调用。This method is called by the public method and the `Finalize` method. 调用受保护的 方法，释放参数设置为 `true` 。 invokes the protected method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. `Finalize``Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取在数据源中执行删除操作所需的自动生成的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用 方法进行信息性或故障排除，因为它返回 要执行的对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您还可以将 用作修改后的命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，你可以调用 和修改关联的命令文本，然后在上显式设置 。For example, you might call and modify the associated command text, and then explicitly set that on the . 首次生成 SQL 语句后，如果应用程序 以任何方式更改语句，则必须显式调用。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则， 仍将使用前一语句中的信息，这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时，将首次生成 SQL 语句 。The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls or . 生成参数名称时，默认行为是对 `@p1` 各种参数使用、 `@p2` 等。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on for the various parameters. 如果的重载版本 允许您通过提供布尔值来指定此行为，则可以 通过传递来使生成基于列名称的参数 `True` 。If the overloaded version of allows you to specify this behavior by supplying a Boolean value, you can cause the to generate parameters based on the column names instead by passing `True`.

related.span: 使用 CommandBuilder 生成命令

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用 方法进行信息性或故障排除，因为它返回 要执行的对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您还可以将 用作修改后的命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，你可以调用 和修改命令文本，然后在上显式设置 。For example, you might call and modify the command text, and then explicitly set that on the . 首次生成 SQL 语句后，如果应用程序 以任何方式更改语句，则必须显式调用。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则， 仍将使用前一语句中的信息，这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时，将首次生成 SQL 语句 。The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls or . 生成参数名称时，默认行为是对 `@p1` 各种参数使用、 `@p2` 等。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on for the various parameters. 通过 `true` 为参数传递，可以 `useColumnsForParameterNames` 强制根据 列名生成参数。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 仅当满足以下条件时，此操作才会成功：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已指定，其长度等于或大于生成的参数名称。The has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 生成的参数名称满足正则表达式中指定的条件 。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the regular expression. - 指定了。A is specified.

summary.span: 获取在数据源中执行更新操作所需的自动生成的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform updates at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用 方法进行信息性或故障排除，因为它返回 要执行的对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您还可以将 用作修改后的命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，你可以调用 和修改命令文本，然后在上显式设置 。For example, you might call and modify the command text, and then explicitly set that on the . 首次生成 SQL 语句后，如果应用程序 以任何方式更改语句，则必须显式调用。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则， 仍将使用前一语句中的信息，这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时，将首次生成 SQL 语句 。The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls or . 生成参数名称时，默认行为是对 `@p1` 各种参数使用、 `@p2` 等。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on for the various parameters. 如果的重载版本 允许您指定此行为，则可以使 根据列名生成参数。If the overloaded version of allows you to specify this behavior, you can cause the to generate parameters based on the column names instead.

returns.span: 自动生成的、执行更新所需的 对象。

span.span: The automatically generated object required to perform updates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用 方法进行信息性或故障排除，因为它返回 要执行的对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您还可以将 用作修改后的命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，你可以调用 和修改命令文本，然后在上显式设置 。For example, you might call and modify command text, and then explicitly set that on the . 首次生成 SQL 语句后，如果应用程序 以任何方式更改语句，则必须显式调用。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则， 仍将使用前一语句中的信息，这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时，将首次生成 SQL 语句 。The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls or . 生成参数名称时，默认行为是对 `@p1` 各种参数使用、 `@p2` 等。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on for the various parameters. 通过 `true` 为参数传递，可以 `useColumnsForParameterNames` 强制根据 列名生成参数。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 仅当满足以下条件时，基于列名生成参数才会成功：Generation of the parameters based on column names succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已指定，其长度等于或大于生成的参数名称。The has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 生成的参数名称满足正则表达式中指定的条件 。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the regular expression. - 指定了。A is specified.

summary.span: 获取或设置指定其名称包含空格或保留标记等字符的数据库对象（例如，表或列）时使用的开始字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the beginning character or characters to use when specifying database objects (for example, tables or columns) whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
The beginning character or characters to use.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些数据源可能包含可以包含字符（如空格、逗号和分号）的对象。Some data sources may have objects that can contain characters such as spaces, commas, and semicolons. 若要容纳此功能，请使用 和 属性来指定分隔符（如左括号和右括号）以封装对象名称。To accommodate this capability, use the and properties to specify delimiters such as a left bracket and a right bracket to encapsulate the object name. > [!NOTE] > 虽然在 生成 insert、update 或 delete 命令后无法更改或属性，但你可以在调用的方法之后更改其设置 `Update` 。Although you cannot change the or properties after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated, you can change their settings after calling the `Update` method of a .

exception.span: 当生成 Insert、Update 或 Delete 命令后，不能更改此属性。

span.span: This property cannot be changed after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string SchemaSeparator { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property SchemaSeparator As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SchemaSeparator { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SchemaSeparator : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要用作架构标识符和任何其他标识符之间的分隔符的字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the character to be used for the separator between the schema identifier and any other identifiers.

value.span: 要用作架构分隔符的字符。

span.span: The character to be used as the schema separator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，数据库服务器通过将标识符中的架构名称与一个字符隔开，来指示标识符的架构。Generally, database servers indicate the schema for an identifier by separating the schema name from the identifier with some character. 例如，SQL Server 使用冒号创建完整的标识符，如 **person： CustomerName**，其中 "person" 是架构名称，而 "CustomerName" 是标识符。For example, SQL Server uses a colon, creating complete identifiers such as **Person:CustomerName**, where "Person" is the schema name and "CustomerName" is the identifier. 设置此属性可让开发人员修改此行为。Setting this property allows developers to modify this behavior.

related.span: 使用 CommandBuilder 生成命令

span.span: Generating Commands with CommandBuilders
ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SetAllValues { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.SetAllValues : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指定 update 语句中是包含所有列值还是仅包含更改的列值。

span.span: Specifies whether all column values in an update statement are included or only changed ones.

value.span: 如果 生成的 UPDATE 语句包含所有列，则为 ；如果它仅包含更改的列，则为 。

span.span: if the UPDATE statement generated by the includes all columns; if it includes only changed columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由生成的 UPDATE 语句 可以包括有关所有列的更新信息，也可以仅包含其值已更改的那些列的相关信息。The UPDATE statement generated by a can include update information about all the columns, or it can include information only about those columns whose values have changed. 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则生成的 UPDATE 语句包括所有列，无论它们的值是否已更改。Setting the property to `true` causes the generated UPDATE statement to include all the columns, whether their values have changed or not.

span.span: Registers the to handle the event for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法旨在供提供程序编写器生成自定义命令生成器使用。This method is intended for use by provider writers building a custom command builder. 当向添加新的时 ，它将为 DbDataAdapter 的 **RowUpdating** 事件注册。When a new is added to the , it is registered for the DbDataAdapter's **RowUpdating** event. 如果再次调用此方法，则会为 该 DbDataAdapter 的 **RowUpdating** 事件取消注册。If this method is called again with the same , the is unregistered for that DbDataAdapter's **RowUpdating** event.
